Name: Hunter X - Begin
About the game: # Feature  - Stylish action game using the sword.  - There are several combo skills. (You can see it as a tip in the game.)  - There are 3 types of special attack.  - Control yourself, kill zombies.  - The action takes place with the birth of the hero (Hunter X) and the story of catching the villain (Dr.Jod). # Control - Game Play: Keyboard => Move: W, S, A, D / Attack Key: J, K, L / SP Attack Key: U, I, O - Menu: Mouse # Character description  + Hunter X (Hero)   - By chance Dr.Jod's zombie gas awakens his superpowers, and he's trained by the Hunter Group for three years. After that, he goes to catch Dr.Jod, who makes zombies.  + Dr.Jod (Villain)   - A mad scientist who invades visible cities and towns while continuing to make zombies.
